Package com.jgalgo.io

Interface GraphWriter

  • public interface GraphWriter
    A writer that writes Graphs to files/IO-writer.
    Author:
    Barak Ugav
    See Also:
    GraphReader

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      static GraphWriter newInstance​(String format)
      Get new GraphWriter instance by a format name.
      default void writeGraph​(IntGraph graph, File file)
      Write a graph to a file.

    • Method Detail

      • writeGraph

        void writeGraph​(IntGraph graph,
                Writer writer)
        Write a graph to an I/O writer.
        Parameters:
        graph - a graph
        writer - an I/O writer to which the graph description will be written to

      • writeGraph

        default void writeGraph​(IntGraph graph,
                        File file)
        Write a graph to a file.
        Parameters:
        graph - a graph
        file - a file descriptor to which the graph will be written to

      • writeGraph

        default void writeGraph​(IntGraph graph,
                        String path)
        Write a graph to a file, given its path.
        Parameters:
        graph - a graph
        path - a path to a file to which the graph will be written to

      • newInstance

        static GraphWriter newInstance​(String format)
        Get new GraphWriter instance by a format name.

        Any one of the following formats is supported: ['csv', 'dimacs', 'gexf', 'gml', 'graph6', 'space6', 'graphml', 'leda']

        Parameters:
        format - the name of the format
        Returns:
        a writer that can write graphs with the given format
